name: @laylo.com/partner
author: Laylo
description: The official Laylo partner Node.js SDK

scripts.check-token: if [ ! -f .npmrc ]; then echo 'Error: .npmrc file is missing. Please provide the necessary configuration.'; exit 1; fi;                    if ! grep -q 'token=' .npmrc; then echo 'Error: Token is missing. Please provide a valid token.'; exit 1; fi;                    TOKEN=$(grep '^token=' .npmrc | cut -d'=' -f2);                    RESPONSE=$(curl -sSL -X GET https://dev.laylo.com/api/check-integrator-key/$TOKEN);                    if [[ ! $RESPONSE == *"success":true* ]]; then                      echo 'Error: Invalid token. Please check your .npmrc file or contact the package administrator.';                      exit 1;                    fi;                    echo 'Token validated. Proceeding with installation.';
